<!--Downloading GeomLab-->
From this page, you can download the GeomLab programming
environment in binary, executable form.
You can also access the source code at BitBucket.
The software is covered by a permissive [[#Software licence|licence]] 
that is shown at the foot of this page. You can:
* Download GeomLab as a {{Resource|geomlab.jar|binary JAR file}}. (Saving this file on a Windows machine, for example, allows GeomLab to be started by double-clicking on the file.)
* Visit our [https://bitbucket.org/Spivey/geomlab BitBucket repository] to find the source code.
* Read instructions for [[building GeomLab]] from the source code.
